import React from 'react'; import accueil from '../images/accueil.jpg' import '../styles/Acceuil.css' import Programmation from './Programmation'; import Concerts from './Concerts'; import Map from './Map' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; function Acceuil() { return (
